titles.title: A resolution electing Gary B. Myrick, of Virginia, as Secretary for the Minority of the Senate.
A resolution electing Gary B. Myrick, of Virginia, as Secretary for the Minority of the Senate.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Elects Gary B. Myrick of Virginia as Secretary for the Minority of the Senate.
